oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Bud Ogle of Gatlinburg
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Bud Ogle of Gatlinburg, Sevier County, Tennessee. Head and shoulders portrait of older bearded man wearing farm shirt and suspenders.
Gatlinburg, in the Smoky Mountains, is famous for craftsmen. Noah "Bud" Ogle and his wife lived in the park and their cabin still stands.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: RG 82: Tennessee Department of Conservation Photograph Collection, 1937-1976
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Older people; Farmers; Men
